snippet: A gun battle between police officers and an armed man broke out near Texas A&M University. Our colleague Michael Schwirtz reports on the Lede blog about the heroics of a nearby resident.
abstract: A gun battle between police officers and an armed man broke out near Texas A&M University. Our colleague Michael Schwirtz reports on the Lede blog about the heroics of a nearby resident.

headline.main: Army Medic Cares for the Wounded at Texas A&M
